product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Battery, Micro USB Charger, Quick Start Guide
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty for Device and 6 Months Manufacturer Warranty for In-box Accessories Including Batteries from the Date of Purchase
product_specification.Warranty Service Type: Customer can call at 1800 1028 169 for customer support for further information and For damage/repair services customer can visit to nearest services centre

product_description.Solid Design: Boasting large and ergonomic keys, this Nokia handset makes it convenient for you to dial numbers and type text messages. It has a robust polycarbonate shell, along with a durable finish, that make it tough as well as stylish.
product_description.Big Screen: Its 6.1 cm (2.4) screen helps you see its contents clearly, ensuring comfortable and enjoyable usage.
product_description.FM Radio: Using this feature, you can access your favourite FM stations and enjoy a wide variety of content. Oh, and you can do that with or without using a pair of earphones.
product_description.Long-lasting Battery: Its battery offers you long hours of usage, so you can talk to your near and dear ones for hours on end.
product_description.Ample Storage Space: This phone lets you store up to 2,000 contacts and 500 messages, so you can access them anytime without any hassle.

review: Totally disappointed. Can't expect such quality from Nokia. No sound quality, average screen quality, button toiluch is ok ok, torch light is very low, body is very cheaper like babies third class toyd. Even though total worthless mobile. Local brand are giving much better product even cheaper than this Mobile.
Been using this phone for more then two week now now the battery getting draine so fast...n yeah this is not the camera phone..
Great Phone,Nokia is still working As Promised (NOKIS Connecting People) ❤️.

No ringtone selection for alarm. And snooze time adjust. No sufficient preloaded wallpapers. Only one black in colour.

Display bis 2.4" but can't utilizes, NO ECTRA LARGE SIZE CONTACT DISPLAY OPTION

It's a basic keypad Nokia but the quality is not up to the expectations.
Battery backup is normally two days.
Having only one Wallpaper you can change it or add any image.
Only limited choice of ringtones ( 5).
Less volume.
I buy only because of Nokia brand, if you don't considering about the brand go for some other brand with the same price range , that's having more features than this Nokia.

The battery drains out in just 2 days in standby mode, without even single call or sms.
Don't know what nokia service will tell about it..
